steps.text: Clean new external composite surface with approved cleaner.
Sand old or new gelcoat to remove imperfections.
Apply filler if needed and feather the repair.
Finish by sanding repair area with fine-grit abrasive discs.
Ensure surface is dry.
Mask areas with 3M™ Precision Masking Tape and back up with industrial masking tape.
Apply 3M™ Purple Premium Plus Masking Film.
Mix gelcoat in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 disposable spray cup.
Adjust 3M™ Performance Spray Gun settings.
Apply gelcoat with a spray gun.
Refer to page 3 & 4 for gelcoat finishing process.
Clean new external composite surface with approved cleaner.
Sand with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II abrasives and a Soft Interface Pad.
Refine sand scratch using P1200 grade 3M™ Hookit™ Flexible Abrasive Foam Discs.
Compound surface with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Gelcoat Heavy Cutting Compound and a Rotary Polishing machine.
Polish with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Gelcoat Compound + Polish and a wool compounding pad.
Apply 3M™ Perfect-It™ Boat Wax to a 10cm x 10cm area and wipe clean before it dries.
Clean the surface with approved cleaner.
Sand the surface with a DA sander and 3M Hookit 775L Cubitron II 80+ grade abrasive discs.
Apply 3M Marine Premium Filler.
Apply masking tapes and film.
Apply primer with a 3M Performance Spray Gun.
Sand the primer with dry guide coat and 320+ grade abrasive discs.
Apply marine paint with a 3M Performance Spray Gun.
Clean the surface.
Sand with a DA sander and 3M Hookit Purple Finishing Film Disc 260L+ P1200/1500 grade (dry option).
Sand with a DA sander and 3M Trizact Hookit Clear Coat Sanding Disc grade 1500 (wet option).
Refine P1200 scratches with a flexible abrasive foam disc P2000 grade.
Clean the surface with an approved cleaner.
Sand the bottom surface using a dual-action sander with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron² II 220+ grade abrasive.
Mix and apply 3M™ Marine Premium Filler.
After it cures, sand with 120+ grade abrasive, then finish with 220+ grade.
Ensure the surface is dry.
Apply masking tapes and film as described in previous processes.
Mix bottom paint in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cup (remove lid filter).
Use a 3M™ Performance Spray Gun, holding it 15cm-20cm from the surface to apply the paint.
Consult a safety professional or visit www.3M.com.
Contact 3M UK plc for automotive aftermarket inquiries.
Contact 3M Ireland Limited for automotive aftermarket inquiries.

constraints.text: Use appropriate protective equipment during the process.

entities.content: 3M Perfect-It Boat Wash, 3M Perfect-It High Performance Cloth
